oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: William Moultrie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of William Moultrie standing on the battlefield in uniform with his hat in his hand. Behind him are an assortment of cannons, a flag, and two other soldiers. His uniform includes a jacket, vest, collared shirt, breeches, and boots.
Revolutionary War general, Governor of South Carolina.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chappel, Alonzo, 1828-1887
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Moultrie, William, 1730-1805
